subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Spain’s discreet coach, Vicente Del Bosque, and its star, Andrés Iniesta, embody the team’s spirit as they embark on defense of their title in Brazil.
snippet: Spain’s discreet coach, Vicente Del Bosque, and its star, Andrés Iniesta, embody the team’s spirit as they embark on defense of their title in Brazil.
